updates.description: The Venn API v2.0 introduces new endpoints for managing operations, allowing users to create, update, and delete operations directly from their own applications. It also includes improved error handling and more detailed response data.
updates.automation_value: This update allows businesses to automate the management of their operations, reducing the need for manual intervention and saving time.
updates.business_impact: By automating operation management, businesses can reduce manual errors, increase efficiency, and focus on more strategic tasks.

updates.description: The Workflow Automation Module allows users to automate common tasks and processes within Venn. Users can create custom workflows that trigger based on specific events or conditions, and these workflows can include actions such as creating operations, updating data, or sending notifications.
updates.automation_value: This feature can significantly reduce the amount of manual work required to manage operations, as tasks can be automated and executed automatically when certain conditions are met.
updates.business_impact: Automating workflows can streamline operations, reduce the risk of manual errors, and free up employees to focus on more strategic tasks.

updates.description: The Salesforce Integration Enhancement improves the integration between Venn and Salesforce, allowing data to be synced more efficiently and accurately. It also introduces new options for mapping data between the two systems.
updates.automation_value: This enhancement can save time by automating the process of syncing data between Venn and Salesforce, reducing the need for manual data entry and ensuring that data is always up-to-date.
updates.business_impact: Improved integration with Salesforce can lead to more accurate data, better decision-making, and more efficient operations.

updates.description: Time-Saving Templates are pre-configured operation templates that users can use to quickly create new operations. These templates include common operation types and can be customized to suit the user's needs.
updates.automation_value: These templates can save time by reducing the amount of work required to set up new operations, allowing users to get started more quickly and efficiently.
updates.business_impact: By reducing the time needed to set up operations, businesses can get up and running faster and respond more quickly to changing conditions.

updates.description: The Automated Reporting Feature allows users to schedule and automate the generation of reports. Users can specify the data they want to include in the report, the format of the report, and when the report should be generated.
updates.automation_value: This feature can save time by automating the process of generating reports, reducing the need for manual intervention and ensuring that reports are always ready when needed.
updates.business_impact: Automated reporting can ensure that decision-makers always have the most up-to-date information, leading to better decisions and more effective strategies.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Venn API v2.0
   Release Date: November 15, 2023
   Description: The Venn API v2.0 introduces new endpoints for managing operations, allowing users to create, update, and delete operations directly from their own applications. It also includes improved error handling and more detailed response data.
   Automation Value: This update allows businesses to automate the management of their operations, reducing the need for manual intervention and saving time.

2. Update Name: Workflow Automation Module
   Release Date: March 10, 2024
   Description: The Workflow Automation Module allows users to automate common tasks and processes within Venn. Users can create custom workflows that trigger based on specific events or conditions, and these workflows can include actions such as creating operations, updating data, or sending notifications.
   Automation Value: This feature can significantly reduce the amount of manual work required to manage operations, as tasks can be automated and executed automatically when certain conditions are met.

3. Update Name: Salesforce Integration Enhancement
   Release Date: July 20, 2024
   Description: The Salesforce Integration Enhancement improves the integration between Venn and Salesforce, allowing data to be synced more efficiently and accurately. It also introduces new options for mapping data between the two systems.
   Automation Value: This enhancement can save time by automating the process of syncing data between Venn and Salesforce, reducing the need for manual data entry and ensuring that data is always up-to-date.

4. Update Name: Time-Saving Templates
   Release Date: January 5, 2025
   Description: Time-Saving Templates are pre-configured operation templates that users can use to quickly create new operations. These templates include common operation types and can be customized to suit the user's needs.
   Automation Value: These templates can save time by reducing the amount of work required to set up new operations, allowing users to get started more quickly and efficiently.

5. Update Name: Automated Reporting Feature
   Release Date: June 30, 2025
   Description: The Automated Reporting Feature allows users to schedule and automate the generation of reports. Users can specify the data they want to include in the report, the format of the report, and when the report should be generated.
   Automation Value: This feature can save time by automating the process of generating reports, reducing the need for manual intervention and ensuring that reports are always ready when needed.
